text:
Mineral Resources Development (Strahan) Order 2003

I make the following order, on the recommendation of the Director, under section 161B(1) of the Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 .

15 September 2003

P. A. Lennon

Minister for Economic Development, Energy and Resources

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Mineral Resources Development (Strahan) Order 2003 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect 30 days after the date on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Declaration of landslip area
    The area of land specified in Schedule 1 to this order is declared to be an A landslip area.

SCHEDULE 1 - Landslip area

The area of land at Strahan in the municipal area of West Coast shown hatched and bounded by a thick black line on Plan 6173 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Schedule 2 to this order.

SCHEDULE 2 - Plan

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 1 October 2003

This order is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
